xyz.fsgik.common.net.udp

接口 FsUdpServerHandler


  • public interface FsUdpServerHandler
    UDP network handler in server endpoint.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 默认方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      default void onException(FsNetServerException exception)
      Callback when an exception occurs on the server.
      default void onException(FsUdpHeader header, FsUdpClient client, java.lang.Throwable throwable, java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer)
      Callback when an exception occurs for the udp packet.

    • 方法详细资料

      • onException

        default void onException(FsNetServerException exception)
        Callback when an exception occurs on the server.
        参数:
        exception - the exception for server

      • onException

        default void onException(FsUdpHeader header,
                         FsUdpClient client,
                         java.lang.Throwable throwable,
                         java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer)
        Callback when an exception occurs for the udp packet.
        参数:
        header - header of the packet
        client - the server itself as a client
        throwable - the exception
        buffer - remaining buffer of the packet, readonly and initial position is 0
